rina.flow
Class Flow

java.lang.Object
  rina.flow.Flow
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlowAPI
public class Flow
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlowAPI

This class is used to create a flow for Zero DIF It uses TCP flow.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Yuefeng Wang and Flavio Esposito . Computer Science Department, Boston University
